title: Suggestion on skins (Not sure where to post)
body: Ok so i was loading into a game today as Pentakill olaf, And i thought What if RIOT were to make skins that are achievable by doing certain things for example You gain a skin if you get a certain amount of wins in a row in ranked, Like "Bronze, Silver & Gold medal (Insert champion name here)" i dont really know how to explain it but if some skins were achievable it would bring more enjoyment to the game knowing you can achieve something by doing a certain amount of something. I dont know if that makes any sence but i hope it does XD Anyways hope Riot reads this and understands what i mean! Happy Gaming GL & HF {{summoner:4}}

replies.body: People in bronze should get rusty blitzcrank.. lol.
Remember we do have the Victorious skin line for when you achieve gold or higher in a ranked season!
So you've given out a total of 4 free skins? for in game activity :P.

4 skins for **all players** that achieved gold and above. I only mention it to show we already do something similar. I think its a cool idea, hopefully we do have more things like the victorious skins in the future.

In my opinion it would be great if we were to do it, Hence why i posted it, It would bring more enjoyment knowing for doing certain things you can recieve a prize as per say, I hope Riot will consider doing more then the victorious skins.

I agree that they should have other bonus skins for doing things, the issue is there aren't too many systems officially in place by Riot atm.
For instance maybe once the Mastery system is in place you could achieve a skin when you mastered X number of champs, something higher than 50. 
There should also be a end of year skin for honour achieved or maybe for never being banned/punished within the season. Neither of these two feel quite, but if their were changes to the current system, there should be a way to award positive players.
If the skins were achievable then there would be no need to buy rp..
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/s4EeVVRE-project-zac I still like my idea better.
Good idea, let's rip off SMITE some more, we already stole their champion mastery system, let's steal the skin system also.
Rip off SMITE? man there are more games then just smite that do this. It's apart of gaming,
